attributes.action: Ensure that honest motorists are not pressured into admiting guilt of speeding or other motiring offences by theatening a large fine if they do not admit fault.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The £1000 alternative is a deterant not only to the dishonest - as intended. But also to the innocent. Therefore is in itself perverting the course of justice. I propose that a the £1000 is instead made double the initial fine. Thus still detering the guilty but giving a fair chance to persons whom honestly feel that they have been fined unfairly or in an illegal manner
